caption.p: Spatial analyses and empirical distribution of the annual probability of herd infection (i.e. to have at least one persistently or transiently infected animal once over the year). A Histogram of the probability ( Prob_being_inf), B spatial distribution of herds according to their probability (blue: herds with values lower than the 5 th percentile (0.42); purple: herds with values higher than the 95 th percentile (0.69); grey: other herds). Analyses were based on 100 runs.
